text: Verner Lundström (born 30 January 1901 in Arvidsjaur, Sweden; died 18 October 1983 in Glommersträsk, Sweden) was a Swedish cross-country skier. In 1930 he won the Vasaloppet competition. == References == Category:1901 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Swedish skiers
title: Verner Lundström
